mapper.select: /* * 采购报价页面-我的报价Tab */ SELECT T_ICIN1.U_QuoDate, /*采购报价时间*/ T_ICIN1.U_BaseEntry, /*询价单编号*/ T_ICIN1.U_CardName, /*供应商名称*/ T_ICIN1.U_CardCode, /*供应商代码*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoGroupCode, /*供应商性质*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoModle, /*报价型号*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoBrand, /*报价品牌*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoLevel, /*供应商等级*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoCurr, /*报价货币*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoQty, /*报价数量*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoYear, /*报价批次*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoPrice, /*供方报价*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoDelivery, /*供方交期*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoRemark, /*供方备注*/ T_ICIN1.U_Status, /*报价状态*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoVatGroup, /*报价税率代码*/ ( T_ICIN1.U_QuoCurr + '+' + T_ICIN1.U_QuoVatGroup + '+' + CAST ( CAST ( T_OVTG.Rate AS FLOAT ) AS VARCHAR ) ) AS 'CurVat', ( T_ICIN1.U_QuoCurr + N'（' + CAST ( CAST ( T_OVTG.Rate AS FLOAT ) AS VARCHAR ) ) + N'%）' AS 'CurVatLabel', T_OUSI.UserName AS 'U_BuyerName',/*采购员姓名*/ T_OCDP.Name AS 'DftDeptName' /*采购部门名称*/ FROM T_ICIN1 LEFT JOIN T_OUSI ON T_ICIN1.U_Buyer = T_OUSI.UserSign /*采购员信息*/ LEFT JOIN T_OCDP ON T_OUSI.DftDept = T_OCDP.DeptCode /*公司部门*/ LEFT JOIN T_OVTG ON T_OVTG.Code = T_ICIN1.U_QuoVatGroup /*税率*/ /*查询关联型号*/ WHERE T_ICIN1.U_QuoModle IN ( SELECT SDADA_1.sno FROM SDADA SDADA_1 WHERE SDADA_1.TAG IN ( SELECT SDADA.TAG FROM SDADA WHERE SDADA.sno = #{sc.modle} ) ) AND T_ICIN1.U_Buyer = #{sc.userSign} /*查询采购员*/ AND T_ICIN1.U_QuoDate IS NOT NULL

/* * 销售报价页面-采购报价Tab */ SELECT T.U_QuoDate, /*报价日期*/ T.U_Buyer, /*采购员编号*/ T_OUSI.UserName AS 'U_BuyerName', /*采购员姓名*/ T_OUSI.DftDept, /*采购部门编号*/ T_OCDP.Name AS 'DftDeptName', /*采购部门名称*/ T.U_QuoGroupCode, /*供应商性质*/ T.U_QuoLevel, /*供应商等级*/ U_ICIN1.Status, /*价格类型*/ T.U_QuoModle, /*报价型号*/ T.U_ECCN, /*ECCN*/ T.U_QuoBrand, /*报价品牌*/ T.U_QuoQty, /*报价数量*/ T.U_QuoCurr, /*采购报价货币*/ T.U_QuoPrice, /*单价*/ T.U_QuoVatGroup, /*税率代码*/ T_OVTG.Name AS 'U_QuoVatName', /*税率文本*/ T_OVTG.Rate AS 'U_QuoVatRate', /*税点*/ T.U_QuoDelivery AS 'U_QuoDelivery', /*供方交期*/ T.U_QuoExplain /*备注*/ FROM ( SELECT U_BaseEntry, U_BaseLine, Modle, U_Secrecy, U_QuoDate, U_Buyer, U_QuoGroupCode, U_QuoLevel, U_QuoModle, U_ECCN, U_QuoBrand, U_QuoQty, U_QuoCurr, U_QuoPrice, U_QuoVatGroup, U_QuoDelivery, U_QuoExplain FROM T_ICIN1 UNION ALL SELECT U_BaseEntry, U_BaseLine, Modle, U_Secrecy, U_QuoDate, U_Buyer, U_QuoGroupCode, U_QuoLevel, U_QuoModle, U_ECCN, U_QuoBrand, U_QuoQty, U_QuoCurr, U_QuoPrice, U_QuoVatGroup, U_QuoDelivery, U_QuoExplain FROM U_ICIN11 ) T LEFT JOIN T_OUSI on T.U_Buyer = T_OUSI.UserSign LEFT JOIN T_OCDP ON T_OUSI.DftDept = T_OCDP.DeptCode LEFT JOIN U_ICIN1 ON T.U_BaseEntry = U_ICIN1.DocEntry AND T.U_BaseLine = U_ICIN1.LineNum LEFT JOIN T_OVTG ON T.U_QuoVatGroup = T_OVTG.Code WHERE T.Modle IN ( SELECT SDADA_1.sno FROM SDADA SDADA_1 WHERE SDADA_1.TAG IN ( SELECT SDADA.TAG FROM SDADA WHERE SDADA.sno = #{sc.modle} ) )

SELECT T_ICIN1.*, ( CASE WHEN T_ICIN1.U_Status = 'B' THEN N'采购报价' WHEN T_ICIN1.U_Status = 'E' THEN N'云汉报价' END ) AS 'ItemDescStatus', T_OUSI.UserName AS 'U_BuyerName', /*采购员姓名*/ T_OCDP.Name AS 'DftDeptName' /*采购部门*/ FROM T_ICIN1 LEFT JOIN T_OUSI ON T_ICIN1.U_Buyer = T_OUSI.UserSign /*采购员信息*/ LEFT JOIN T_OCDP ON T_OUSI.DftDept = T_OCDP.DeptCode /*公司部门*/ WHERE T_ICIN1.Modle IN ( SELECT SDADA_1.sno FROM SDADA SDADA_1 WHERE SDADA_1.TAG IN ( SELECT SDADA.TAG FROM SDADA WHERE SDADA.sno = #{sc.modle} ) ) AND T_ICIN1.U_QuoDate IS NOT NULL

SELECT T.*, T_OVTG.Rate AS 'U_QuoVatRate', /*税率*/ T_OUSI.UserName AS 'U_BuyerName', /*采购员姓名*/ T_OCDP.Name AS 'DftDeptName' /*采购部门名称*/ FROM ( SELECT T_ICIN1.U_QuoDate, /*报价日期*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoModle, /*报价型号*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoBrand, /*报价品牌*/ T_ICIN1.U_SuoDelivery, /*供方交期*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoGroupCode, /*供应商类型*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoLevel, /*供应商等级*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoQty, /*报价数量*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoYear, /*报价批次*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoCurr, /*报价货币*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoPrice, /*供方报价*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoDelivery, /*报价交期*/ T_ICIN1.U_Buyer, /*采购员*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoVatGroup, /*税率*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoExplain /*采购备注*/ FROM T_ICIN1 WHERE T_ICIN1.U_QuoPrice IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT U_ICIN11.U_QuoDate, /*报价日期*/ U_ICIN11.U_QuoModle, /*报价型号*/ U_ICIN11.U_QuoBrand, /*报价品牌*/ U_ICIN11.U_SuoDelivery, /*供方交期*/ U_ICIN11.U_QuoGroupCode, /*供应商类型*/ U_ICIN11.U_QuoLevel, /*供应商等级*/ U_ICIN11.U_QuoQty, /*报价数量*/ U_ICIN11.U_QuoYear, /*报价批次*/ U_ICIN11.U_QuoCurr, /*报价货币*/ U_ICIN11.U_QuoPrice, /*供方报价*/ U_ICIN11.U_QuoDelivery, /*报价交期*/ U_ICIN11.U_Buyer, /*采购员*/ U_ICIN11.U_QuoVatGroup, /*税率*/ U_ICIN11.U_QuoExplain /*采购备注*/ FROM U_ICIN11 WHERE U_ICIN11.U_QuoPrice IS NOT NULL ) T LEFT JOIN T_OUSI ON T_OUSI.UserSign = T.U_Buyer LEFT JOIN T_OCDP ON T_OUSI.DftDept = T_OCDP.DeptCode LEFT JOIN T_OVTG ON T_OVTG.Code = T.U_QuoVatGroup WHERE T.U_QuoModle IN ( SELECT SDADA_1.sno FROM SDADA SDADA_1 WHERE SDADA_1.TAG IN ( SELECT SDADA.TAG FROM SDADA WHERE SDADA.sno = #{sc.modle} ) ) ORDER BY T.U_QuoDate DESC
